mapper.insert: INSERT INTO af_recycle_view ( gmt_create, gmt_modified, qty, user_id, `type` ) VALUES ( NOW(), NOW(), 1, #{userId}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT id,is_delete,gmt_create,gmt_modified,user_id,`type`,qty FROM af_recycle_view WHERE is_delete = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} AND `type` = #{type} LIMIT 1
UPDATE af_recycle_view SET gmt_modified = now(),qty = qty + 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND `type` = #{type}
